    Methods in boundary that return Movie
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Movie
    UserHandler.getMovieByTitleFromUser()
    Returns a movie by prompting user for movie title, then movie id from a list of movies with matching movie title.
    static Movie
    UserHandler.getMovieFromUser()
    Returns a movie by prompting user to input its movie id until correct input is given.

    Description

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<Movie>
    MovieController.findMovies(String title)
    Returns a list of movies by searching with titles containing matching keywords in the movie database.
    ArrayList<Movie>
    MovieController.sortByRating(ArrayList<Movie> movies)
    Sorts the given list of movies in descending order based on its averageReviewRating attribute.
    ArrayList<Movie>
    MovieController.sortByTicketSales(ArrayList<Movie> movies)
    Sorts the given list of movies in descending order based on its ticketSales attribute.
    Methods in control with parameters of type Movie
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    MovieController.addReviewToMovie(Movie movie, Review review)
    Adds the given review to the given movie's entry and updates the movie's average rating in the movie database.
    void
    ShowingController.deleteInvalidShowings(Movie movie, LocalDate releaseDate, LocalDate endDate)
    Deletes all showings with showtimes that no longer fall within the valid showing period from the Showing database, for the given movie.
    void
    ShowingController.deleteShowing(Movie movie)
    Deletes showing by searching with the given movie in the showing database.
    ArrayList<Showing>
    ShowingController.findShowings(Cineplex cineplex, Movie movie)
    Returns a list of showings by searching with their cineplex and movie in the showing database.
    ArrayList<Showing>
    ShowingController.findShowings(Movie movie)
    Returns a list of showings by searching with their movie in the showing database.
    void
    MovieController.updateMovieAttribute(Movie movie, Enumerators.MovieAttribute attribute, Object newAttributeValue)
    Updates the selected movie's entry in the movie database with the given new attribute.
